About us

Be the most respected realty developer, sustainably delivering customer delight and well being for our communities and environment
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1682629859423{margin-top: -100px !important;padding-top: 70px !important;padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-12″][vc_single_image image=”8111″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”]






    [/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-12″][vc_custom_heading text=”Welcome to Aditya Estates” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:36px|text_align:left|line_height:42px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]

    BEST PROPERTY DEALER IN NOIDA

    Aditya Estates is an ISO-certified and RERA-registered firm with its head office located in Sector 18, Noida. With over 15 years of experience, the agency has a team of highly skilled professionals who have previously worked in MNCs and Corporates. Aditya Estates has a strong presence in the real estate market in the Delhi NCR region and is known for its transparency, integrity, and commitment to customer satisfaction. Some of the key points about Aditya Estates are:

    • Aditya Estates provides expert guidance and assistance to clients in their real estate plans, whether it’s for buying, selling, renting, or leasing properties.
    • The agency specializes in fresh bookings, resale, and rentals of residential, commercial, and industrial properties, catering to a wide range of clients in the Delhi NCR region.
    • Aditya Estates has extensive expertise and experience in the local real estate market, allowing them to provide personalized services to clients and help them find the perfect property that meets their requirements.
    • The agency has a wide range of properties in their portfolio, representing major real estate developers and builders in the area.
    • Aditya Estates’ team of dedicated and experienced professionals work diligently to ensure a smooth and hassle-free experience for their clients throughout the real estate transaction process.
    • As a professionally managed organization, Aditya Estates is known for providing comprehensive solutions for real estate transactions and delivering high-quality services to their clients.
    • The agency is ISO certified and RERA-registered, ensuring that their services adhere to high standards of quality and professionalism.
    • With their head office located in the heart of Noida’s commercial hub at Sector 18, Aditya Estates has a strong presence in the local real estate market and a wide network of contacts, allowing them to provide reliable and trusted services to their clients.

    [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” css=”.vc_custom_1682630378246{background-color: #821417 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Aditya Estates | Best Property Dealer in Noida | Help line Number : +91 9319988572″ font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:30px|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” google_fonts=”font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:600%20bold%20regular%3A600%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1684314159110{padding-top: 20px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
